tweets.text: @pinkcastleprin1 @BBCPanorama @BBCNews @Channel4News @itvnews @thetimes @DailyMirror @GOVUK @JeremyVineOn5 @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @SkyNews @JeremyVineOn5 @SkyNews @lucysiegle @AnnaTurns @BBCWatchdog @BBCNews  #anyonewhowilllisten When will this become national news? When will thousands of voices be heard? When will we get our basic human right to fresh air back? When will we be able to breathe? #StopTheStink

Arrived back home yesterday after a few days away and the whole house stunk of hydrogen sulphide (rotten eggs). The smell came in again last night while we were trying to sleep. 

It‚Äôs incredible how this is being tolerated by @EnvAgency @PHE_uk. #StopTheStink #CapItOff https://t.co/hEjtRc0y5f

tweets.text: Hi @rickygervais, we live in a town that is being engulfed with gases coming from Walleys Quarry landfill site. Our pets,children,elderly,hospitals,schools are all suffering. It‚Äôs the most complained about environmental issue in the UK to @EnvAgency Please Help!#stopthestink https://t.co/iuwdhO1udr https://t.co/Qnm8Lf08fn

Whats the point of the magic map and stewardship of protected lapwing, cornbunting & redshank if you ignore it @NaturalEngland @EnvAgency  @Defra @TonyJuniper and allow 450 more houses in #thanet to take their habitat? Not good enough.
@KentWildlife @KentishPlover @bto @CPREKent https://t.co/O7nY1SJ1ly
@rickygervais please get behind our campaign to help dogs and cats and children in #thetownthatcannotbreathe #stopthestink

tweets.text:
Never in my life in the UK did I think fresh air would be a luxury but this is our life now in #newcastleunderlyme A family member has taken me to get the freshest air because where I live cant provide us with that anymore.

@EnvAgencyMids @BBCPanorama @StinkStopthe #STOPTHESTINK https://t.co/Dv2UXf6ZbA

Enough is enough the @EnvAgencyMids have failed us @ClareDinnisEA you should be held personally responsible, you are allowing all of us and our children to be poisoned you need to go. #sackclaredinnis

tweets.text: @lucyb221 @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids @BBCPanorama Me and all my housemates have been forced to leave our student house and complete our exams at home. We just couldn't take living here anymore!

@SaveLeaMarshes @HMUG_Hackney @RomanGeezer @StonebridgeLock @EnvAgencySE @LDNWaterkeeper @theriverstrust @DrCSyn @tfortysix Photo scoop! Thames Water team arrived while I was at Shortlands sewer this afternoon. They'd traced the culprit in the adjacent industrial estate & served a notice. The green dye is their tracer. They began the cleanup (worker photo with permission). https://t.co/mvMsIjnQqF

tweets.text:
Let‚Äôs talk hydrogen sulphide. 

An average landfill at maximum emits around an average of 3-5ugm3 at its peak.  

Walleys quarry emitted 202ugm3.  A mere 40 times higher.  

 @EnvAgencyMids @DefraGovUK @BorisJohnson @CHEMTrust @MattHancock 
#StopTheStink https://t.co/7wFYZmphcm

A question was asked of me from the #StopTheStink  community how the off-site hydrogen sulphide levels compared to other landfill sites recently monitored by the EA. Here are the results from my FOI request. Walley‚Äôs Quarry Landfill is on the bottom row. https://t.co/qRXBVkXVc8

Me driving an hour away from Newcastle under Lyme today to get some fresh air. 
If the @EnvAgency don‚Äôt grow a pair next month we‚Äôll prob have to drive 2 hours! #stopthestink @StinkStopthe #capitoff https://t.co/i3dTWzRv7i
